name: Malachi's Basics Back to school! (MOD RECREATION!)
name_original: Malachi's Basics Back to school! (MOD RECREATION!)
description:
Welcome to the remastered
version of MBBTS!
This is the ultimate version of Malachi's basics back to school! though I don't know how I can add more modes. so I just stuck with story mode and endless mode!
Meet some familiar faces!
You might meet some familiar faces in the game As well! but some are not in this mod because I didn't want to make that much posters in the detention room.
Question:
Can I mod this?
Yes! you can mod this decompile! but you need to credit me if you do mod it.
Can I use one of your characters?
Yep! you can however you always gotta credit me. if you don't. I will tell you to add my username in the credits cuz I made that character. (NOTE: I MADE SOME OF THE CHARACTERS) and if you don't put my name on the  credits when i told you to. well, lets just say...


Credits:
(The credit are not in the game but I will put them here)
Open source by Porky powers.

Basketball kid Inspired by The playtime from Michaels Teachings in spelling and technology.
Mus_Learn by LetsplayGames_303
Mus_Playtime by BartoszMikMik
